title: Smart Platform for Managing Deferred Purchases
description: Debt Box provides an integrated system that enables customers to buy on credit, while giving stores a dashboard to track all invoices, customers, and outstanding amounts easily and transparently.

card1.title: Store Dashboard for Debt Tracking
card1.description: A smart dashboard that allows you to track customer debts, payment status, and due dates at a glance, with the ability to send reminders and organize invoices efficiently.

card2.title: Secure and Easy to Use
card2.description: A system designed with the highest security standards to protect your data and transactions, with a simple interface that enables any user to interact with it easily without the need for any technical expertise.

howItWorks.subtitle: We Explain Simply
howItWorks.title: How We Work?
howItWorks.description: Debt Box provides a complete system that allows customers to buy on credit, while giving stores a dashboard to easily and transparently track all invoices, customers, and outstanding amounts.

bothParties.title: For Both Parties
bothParties.description: Monitor payment processes and due dates from one place. A transparent system keeps both the customer and the seller informed about the financial status.

businesses.title: For Businesses and Stores
businesses.description: Track all customer invoices. Know who hasn't paid yet and get alerts before due dates.

customers.title: For Customers
customers.description: You can buy your needs now from any store that supports Debt Box, and pay later according to the agreement. Easy tracking of all your purchases.
